Name: **##FOF-CT_version=**
Description: Version of the FOF format used in this case.

Name: **##Table_namespace=**
Description: Identifier for this type of table. Value must be as in the example.

Name: **##Cell_Type=**
Description: This field records the type of cells reported in this table. It is recommended to use an ontology term for example from the `EFO <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/EFO_0000324>`_ ontology. Examples include:  Primary cell line, Immortal cell line, Induced pluripotent stem (IPS) cell, Cell in tissue, Cell in organoid, etc.

Name: *##Extra_Cell_ROI_Type=*
Description: This field records the type of extracellular structure ROIs reported in this table. It is recommended  to use an ontology term such as a child of the `EFO 'organism part' term <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/EFO_0000635>`_. Examples include:  Tissue, Organoid, etc.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported in any Extra_Cell ROI is idenfied as part of this experiment.

Name: *##XYZ_Unit=*
Description: If relevant, the unit used to represent XYZ locations or distances in this table. Note: use micron to avoid problem with special, Greek symbols. Other allowed values *should* be drawn from SI units of `Length <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SI_base_unit>`_. Examples: 'nm', 'micron' 'mm' etc.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported if any locations metrics are reported.

Name: *##Time_Unit=*
Description: If relevant, the unit used to represent a time interval in this table. Allowed values *should* be drawn from SI units of `Time <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SI_base_unit>`_ or be one of the following: 'min', and 'hr'.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported if any time metrics are reported.

Name: *##Intensity_Unit=*
Description: If relevant, the unit used to represent intensity measurements in this table.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported if any intensity metrics are reported.

Name: **#Lab_Name:**
Description: name of the lab where the experiment was performed.

Name: **#Experimenter_Name:**
Description: name of the person performing the experiment.

Name: **#Experimenter_Contact:**
Description: email address of the person performing the experiment.

Name: **#Description:**
Description: A free-text, description of the experiment and of the data recorded in this table. This description should provide a clear understanding of the process utilized to produce the data and contain sufficient details to ensure interpretation and reproducibility.

Name: *#Software_Title:*
Description: The name(s) of the Software(s) that were used here for localizing individual FISH-omics bright Spots, to produce three-dimensional (3D) polymeric chromatin Traces or for segmentation to identify individual cells, subcellular structures or extra-cellular entities, as applicable.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Software_Type:*
Description: The type of this Software. Allowed values: Loc, SpotLoc, Tracing, SpotLoc+Tracing, Segmentation, QC, Distance, Other
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Software_Authors:*
Description: The Name(s) of the individual Author(s) of this Software. In case there are more than one Authors, individual names should be listed as follows, Doe, John; Smith, Jane; etc,.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Software_Description:*
Description: A free-text, description of this Software. This description should provide a detailed understanding of the algortithm and of the analysis parameters that were used, in order to guarantee interpretation and reproducibility.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Software_Repository:*
Description: The URL of any repository or archive where the Software executable release can be obtained.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Software_PreferredCitationID:*
Description: The Unique Identifier for the preferred/primary publication describing this Software. Examples include, Digital Object Identifier (DOI), PubMed Central Identifier (PMCID), ArXiv.org ID etc,.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported any time a software is used to produce data associated with this table.

Name: *#Intensity_Measurement_Method*
Description: If relevant, the method that was used to performed intensity measurements. In particular, sufficient information should be provided to document how digital intensity signals were converted in Photon conunts.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this MUST be reported if any intensity metrics are reported.

Name: #^Optional_Column_1:
Description: Optional column 1 description. This description should provide a clear understanding of the process utilized to produce the data and contain sufficient details to ensure interpretation and reproducibility.

Name: #^Optional_Column_2:
Description: Optional column 2 description. This description should provide a clear understanding of the process utilized to produce the data and contain sufficient details to ensure interpretation and reproducibility.

Name: #^Optional_Column_3:
Description: Optional column 3 description. This description should provide a clear understanding of the process utilized to produce the data and contain sufficient details to ensure interpretation and reproducibility.

Name: **#Additional_Tables:**
Description: list of the additional tables being submitted. Note: use a comma to separate each table name from the next.

Name: **##Columns=**
Description: list of the data column headers used in the table. Note: enclose the column headers and use a comma to separate each header name from the next.
